compatibility.notes: The Sendmail-Open-Source-1.1 license is permissive and allows for integration with other software licenses, provided that incompatible licenses are avoided.

key_requirements: Provide a copy of modified source code or an offer to provide it for three years.
Retain copyright notices and license terms in redistributions.
Include a disclaimer of liability and warranty in redistributions.
license.name: Sendmail-Open-Source-1.1
obligations: Redistributions must qualify as freeware or open source software.
Redistributions must retain copyright notices and license terms.
Binary redistributions must include copyright notice and license terms in documentation.
Cannot use Sendmail's name or trademarks without permission.
License can be canceled for non-compliance.
